recommendedRequirements.Processor: AMD six core CPU @ 3.2 GHz, Intel quad core CPU @ 3.0 GHz
recommendedRequirements.Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7870 or R9 270, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660

reviews.reviewText: Dragon Age: Inquisition's intricate world-building and choice-based gameplay make it a must-play RPG. The depth of characters and quests is impressive.
The fantasy world and companions in Dragon Age: Inquisition create an engaging RPG experience. The tactical combat and choices keep you invested.

comments.comment: Dragon Age: Inquisition's blend of tactical combat and player-driven choices offers an immersive RPG experience. The alliances you form truly matter.
Exploring the rich fantasy world of Dragon Age: Inquisition and shaping its fate is a rewarding RPG experience. The companions and choices are highlights.
